plentry.pd: 0: (Default) Automatic scenario. Automatically matches the appropriate audio quality based on user role and audio routing.
3: High-quality audio scenario, suitable for music-centric use cases. For example: instrument practice.
5: Chatroom scenario, suitable for cases where users frequently join and leave the mic. For example: educational scenarios.
7: Chorus scenario. Suitable for real-time chorus with good network conditions and ultra-low latency requirements.
8: Meeting scenario, suitable for multi-person voice-centric conferences.
10: AI conversation scenario, only applicable for interactions with agents created using the [Agora Conversational AI Engine](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/convoai/restful/landing-page).
Number of enumerations.
0: (Default) Auto scenario. Automatically matches appropriate audio quality based on user role and audio route.
3: High-quality scenario, suitable for music-centric use cases. For example: instrument practice.
5: Chatroom scenario, suitable for frequent mic on/off situations. For example: education scenarios.
7: Chorus scenario. Suitable for real-time chorus with low latency under good network conditions.
8: Meeting scenario, suitable for multi-person voice-centric meetings.
10: AI dialogue scenario, only applicable to interactions with [Agora Conversational AI Engine](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/convoai/restful/landing-page).
Number of enum values.
0: (default) Automatic scenario selection. Matches appropriate audio quality based on user role and audio route.
3: High-quality audio scenario, suitable for music-centric use cases. For example: instrument practice.
5: Chatroom scenario, suitable for use cases where users frequently join and leave the mic. For example: education scenarios.
7: Chorus scenario. Suitable for real-time chorus with low latency under good network conditions.
8: Meeting scenario, suitable for multi-person meetings focusing on voice.
10: AI conversation scenario, only applicable for interactions with agents created using [Agora Conversational AI Engine](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/convoai/restful/landing-page).
Number of enumerations.
0: (Default) Auto scenario. Automatically matches appropriate audio quality based on user role and routing.
3: High-quality scenario suitable for music-focused use cases. Example: Instrument practice.
5: Chatroom scenario, suitable for frequent mic on/off situations. Example: Education.
7: Chorus scenario. Suitable for real-time chorus with low latency and good network conditions.
8: Meeting scenario, suitable for multi-person voice-focused meetings.
10: AI conversation scenario. Only applicable for interaction with [Agora Conversational AI Engine](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/convoai/restful/landing-page).
Number of enumerations.
